acquisitions_director.description: A sharp, no-nonsense executive looking for commercial viability and emotional "stickiness".
acquisitions_director.background: 15 years in film festivals and international sales. Lives in Brooklyn. Values subtext over exposition.

cultural_editor.description: A culturally literate young editor who shapes taste and conversation at a major publication.
cultural_editor.background: Former film school grad turned cultural critic. Based in Los Angeles. Writes for major publications on cinema and visual storytelling.

mass_audience_viewer.description: A regular streaming viewer who watches for entertainment. Will stop watching if confused or bored.
mass_audience_viewer.background: Regular streaming subscriber who watches 2-3 films per week. Prefers clear narratives and engaging characters. Will skip ahead if bored.

social_impact_viewer.description: A purpose-driven viewer who seeks films dealing with social, political, or cultural issues.
social_impact_viewer.background: Works in nonprofit sector. Seeks films that illuminate social issues and inspire action. Values authentic representation and ethical storytelling.
